question:
For which of the following functions f(x) is \(f(a + b) = f(a) + f(b)\)?
(A) \(f(x) = x^2\)
(B) \(f(x) = 5x\)
(C) \(f(x) = 2x + 1\)
(D) \(f(x) =\sqrt{x}\)
(E) \(f(x) = x - 2\)
